name: Cursed Forest (Rasmus Köhler)
description:
Classic topdown shooter. But in this game you will progress through skill roots instead of a skill tree!

Credits:

Ramus Köhler - Game designer

Vilma Kingsepp - Artist

Jakob Söderström - Programmer & music producer
